span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: black;
span.strong:
The mission of the Bridgewater-Raynham Regional School District is to
provide excellence in education for all students in a safe learning environment.

p.span: The Bridgewater-Raynham Regional School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, sex (including pregnancy and gender identity), sexual orientation,
religion, national origin, homelessness or handicap in its educational activities or employment practices.
